resources.string: Bluetooth is not available on your device

NODE Android Demo App is a product from Variable Technologies (variabletech.com).

NODE exists to sense and measure the world around us. Currently, a single NODE device can serve as a flashlight, measure the climate around it, and monitor its own position in space. In the near future, NODE devices will work together to form networks of sensor data. Future interchangeable modules will enable each device to monitor hazardous gases, detect gamma radiation, measure temperature at a distance, and more. NODE is meant to be a tool in whatever context you can imagine. What can you do with it?

Founded by CEO George Yu, Variable believes we are a world of gadgeteers, spearheading new technology and developing new gadgets that can add layers of simplicity, function, and wonder to everyday life. Variable aims to birth the brainchildren of CEO George Yu and his team. Started in a living room, they now work with NASA. 

Welcome to the world of Gadgeteers.
